============================================
sv-tests/chapter-5/5.10-structure-arrays
============================================

/*
:name: structure-arrays
:description: Structure array assignment tests
:tags: 5.10
*/
module top();
  typedef struct {
    int a;
    int b;
  } ms_t;

  ms_t ms[1:0] = '{'{0, 0}, '{1, 1}};

endmodule

----

  (comment)

            (struct_union)

                (variable_decl_assignment
                  name: (simple_identifier))))

              (data_type_or_void
                (data_type

                  name: (simple_identifier)))))

            (simple_identifier)))

            name: (simple_identifier)
            (unpacked_dimension
              (constant_range
                (constant_expression
                  (constant_primary
                    (primary_literal
                      (integral_number
                        (decimal_number
                          (unsigned_number))))))
